log.CheckColumnSQL: select name from syscolumns where id=object_id('T_NoAuditingPrintLog') and name='isreported'
log.AlterSQL: alter table T_NoAuditingPrintLog add isreported int default 0
log.UpdateFlagSQL: update T_NoAuditingPrintLog set isreported=0 where isreported is null
log.CheckRowSQL: select rows as rowcnt from sysindexes i inner join sysobjects o on (o.id = i.id and o.xtype='U') where indid <2 and OBJECT_NAME(i.id)='T_NoAuditingPrintLog'
log.DataSQL: select id,year_info, month_info, year_month_info,hostname,filename,beginDate,printername,isviolation,pagenum,issensitivityname,issensitivity, issidename,isside,copies,sensitivitycontent,dirdocname,delcopies,enddelcopies,direction,iscallbackname,iscallback,excuse, auditname,accname,hostip,username,printstatename,printstate,seclevelname,seclevel,deptname,impdate from ( SELECT CONVERT(varchar(100),printnum) AS id , year(startprinttime)AS year_info, month(startprinttime)AS month_info, LEFT(CONVERT(varchar,startprinttime,120),7) AS year_month_info, [ComputerName] AS hostname, [DocName] as filename, CONVERT(varchar,[StartPrintTime],120) as beginDate, [PrinterName] as printername, '违规' as isviolation, [PageNum] as pagenum, (CASE IsSensitivity WHEN 0 THEN '否' WHEN 1 THEN ' 是' END) AS issensitivityname, (CASE IsSensitivity WHEN 0 THEN '0' WHEN 1 THEN ' 1' END) AS issensitivity, (CASE side WHEN 0 THEN '单面' WHEN 1 THEN ' 双面' END) as issidename, (CASE side WHEN 0 THEN '0' WHEN 1 THEN ' 1' END) as isside, [ShareNum] as copies, [SensitivityContent] as sensitivitycontent, [DirDocName] as dirdocname, [DelShareNum] as delcopies, [endDelShareNum] as enddelcopies, [Direction] as direction, (CASE [DelStatus] WHEN '未销毁' THEN '否' else '是' END) as iscallbackname, (CASE [DelStatus] WHEN '未销毁' THEN '0' else '1' END) as iscallback, [Excuse] as excuse, [Auditor] as auditname, [Examineor] as accname, a.[HostIP] as hostip, b.EmpName as username, (CASE [state] WHEN '打印成功' THEN '成功' WHEN '打印失败' THEN '失败' END) as printstatename, (CASE [state] WHEN '打印成功' THEN '1' WHEN '打印失败' THEN '0' END) as printstate, d.Name as seclevelname, (CASE d.Name WHEN '绝密' THEN '0' WHEN '机密' THEN '1' WHEN '秘密' THEN '2' WHEN '内部' THEN '3' WHEN '公开' THEN '4' else '99' END) as seclevel, dept.DeptName as deptname, CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120) as impdate FROM T_NoAuditingPrintLog a INNER JOIN T_Employee b ON a.EmpID = b.EmpID INNER JOIN T_Department dept ON dept.deptcode = a.deptcode INNER JOIN T_PrintState c ON a.StateNum = c.Num INNER JOIN T_SecretStatus d ON a.Compression =d.Id where a.IsReported=0 and a.IsPeccancy='1' and dept.DeptName is not null and dept.DeptName !='' and dept.DeptName != 'N/A' )a
log.InsertSQL: insert into tb_print_log( id,year_info, month_info, year_month_info,hostname,filename,beginDate,printername,isviolation,pagenum,issensitivityname,issensitivity, issidename,isside,copies,sensitivitycontent,dirdocname,delcopies,enddelcopies,direction,iscallbackname,iscallback,excuse, auditname,accname,hostip,username,printstatename,printstate,seclevelname,seclevel,deptname,impdate,sub_sysid,sub_sysname) values(?,?, ?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
log.SuccessSQL: update T_NoAuditingPrintLog set IsReported=1 where PrintNum in(@[id]) and IsReported=0
